name: Farigiraf
flavorText: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.

previous.name: Clodsire
previous.flavorText: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.

pokemon.name: Girafarig
pokemon.flavorText:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.
